review: Me and my kids love this device. It's meets all our expectations and then some. We Love It!
author: Nicole Mason

review: Love my Fire TV Stick. So glad I got it when it came out. Love being able to watch Netflix and Amazon movies on my tv.
author: robynk27

review: Fire Tv Stick is wonderful!  I can move it to each TV in house with no problem.  Love it!
author: Alexandria Hatton

review: AMAZING!!  Loads so crazy fast!!  Great Quality!!  Easy to set up!!
author: Scott Wotell

review: We've watched a couple of movies so far and really enjoyed the convenience of home movies. We will get plenty of use of the Fire TV Stick!
author: Patty Hopkins

review: Great features but video skips, terrible playback
author: Joseph Subrizi

review: Very easy to set up.  Works great, even in an area where wifi isn't very good.Am very pleased so far with performance.
author: Honest Abe

review: Pretty good. Biggest complaint is that when watching anything in Dolby 5.1 the sound cuts out constantly. So we watch everything in Stereo. Only thing I use this for is watching Netflix and YouTube. Amazon Prime Video is a pain, so I don't use it.
author: Giles "DMG"
